name: Badger
content:
Traits

**Keen Smell**: The badger has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

 Actions

**Bite**: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.
